title: A Gentleman's Secret
description: During a burglary in Kensington, Faith decides to let two of the most different men meet each other: Anthony Percival-Davis, gentleman and son of an Earl, meets Simon, a simple thief from lower London. Will they be able to see beyond the social boundaries? And will they be able to resist their mutual attraction?Readers Advisory: This is the second novelette in the Different Desire anthology.
author: Lady T.L. Jennings
